column5: sweet i will be there.... lots of goodies for me at hirks. Man i love this store. you guys gotta check it out, im pretty sure that you will love it. oh and 25 percent off.. wow what a deal
I just had to stop in and check them out today...  great service and at 25% off; I left with the Mustang float suit I was looking for   Thanks again!
Where and what is Hirks? I live in Cobourg and haven't heard of this place.
It's a fishing store got some good deals  www.hirks.ca
